name: roytang
text:
@secretgeek Not my quote to explain, but:

1. Yes, I think network effects + capitalism (most eyeballs gets the most advertisers, etc) tend to create a "winner take all" landscape and discourage features like interop/peering with other platforms

2. I am unsure if the behavior is necessarily "monopolistic" in nature; I think any government intervention should philosopically be tied to requiring openness/transparency/interop
